Constructor Detail

WiiOsc

public WiiOsc(PApplet p)
Constructor of class WiiOsc

Parameters:
p - The main PApplet, pass "this" from within Processing
Method Detail

isWiiMessage

public boolean isWiiMessage(OscMessage oscMessage)
Checks if the address pattern of the osc message conatsins the string "wii". If it is, you can call process() later.

process

public void process(OscMessage oscMessage)
Here we do most of the work, we check which osc message we received (button, sensor, joystick) and the source (wiimote, nunchuk). Later on we call a method in the main sketch and pass on the needed parameters (i.e. the button which was pressed on the wii)

Parameters:
oscMessage - The OSC Message sent by OSCulator containing a Wii OSC Message. Make sure to call isWiiMessage() before!

invokeMethodWithParams

public void invokeMethodWithParams(Object o,
                                   String m,
                                   Object[] params,
                                   Class[] parTypes)
Parameters:
o - the object which contains the method to call, when passing 'this' from within the processing main sketch, all functions in your main sketch will be recognized (setup(), draw(),..., custom methods)
m - the name of the method to call without "()"
params - Contains the parameters to pass to function m
parTypes[] - Contains the classes of the arguments to pass, as params is of type object, we need this, too
